summary: My tweaks for various NPCs/Followers.  I will be adding on to this.
descriptionHtml:
My tweaks for various NPCs/Followers.  I will be adding on to this.

Required - apacii hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?

and More Hair Colors updated - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27755//?

I also use Brows - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D30411&pUp=1

And Pretty Lips - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1167//?

The followers will level with the player

My first companion I am adding is Vilkas. I made him essential and increased his height to about 6\\\\\\\'4\\\\\\\" if he were real.  Cleaned up his face & gave him a few tweaks.  If you have the NPC overhaul mod, it does interfere with this - it will add some other textures to his face.

Farkas added.  Also taller, cleaned up & essential.  More muscular than Vilkas

I do have \\\\\\\"YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox\\\\\\\" installed in my game. 

Check back, there are more to come.
author: Rak72
